overview: A retired rail official and his wife Amalie purchase a disused railroad wagon to convert it into a villa in the countryside.  One day, Amalie discovers 25,000 Marks hidden behind a picture in the rail car.  The money was put there by a Dutch couple, who tried to smuggle the money across the border during the trainâ€™s last journey.  Sorely tempted to keep the money, Amalie turns it over to the authorities.  The smugglers, who finally find the rail car after a long search, will be turned over to the cops, too.
title: In letzter Minute
